page.title: 17ASH VILLAGE APPRAISAL 1984
page.content: In 1984,the parish council did a survey to find out what the residents thought of their village.It included suggestions,complaints,likes and dislikes.Some of the biggest complaints were: The noise & size of traffic Poor upkeep of footpaths Vandalism/hooliganism No police on the beat. Some suggestions were: Village Policemen A by-pass A pedestrian crossing More car-parks. Some of the most popular likes were: access to London & Europe,choice of schools and free car-parking. Some dislikes were: dogs fouling Recreation Grd.& paths noise of motor-cycles,varied closing days of shops & a dirty bus shelter.
